events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and are reviewing their resume now.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster as the candidate's background aligns with developer roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process for the software engineer role.
The initial screening call was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in key development technologies.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate for the software engineering position on May 10th at 3 PM.
The technical interview was completed; the candidate showed strong problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 13th to further assess cultural fit and discuss compensation details.
The HR interview concluded positively; the candidate aligns well with company values and expectations.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary package and benefits details.
Received positive feedback from the candidate regarding the offer and their excitement about joining the team.
The candidate has accepted the offer and confirmed their start date in early June with onboarding to follow.
Onboarding process has started for the new software engineer to integrate them smoothly into the engineering team.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful onboarding of the new software engineer.
